targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  $__timeGroup(te."Timestamp", $__interval) as time,
  c."Name" as "Country",
  COUNT(*) as "Events"
FROM "ThreatEvents" te
JOIN "Countries" c ON te."SourceCountryId" = c."Id"
WHERE te."DeletedAt" IS NULL 
  AND $__timeFilter(te."Timestamp")
  AND ( ${tenant:singlequote} = 'All' OR te."AsnRegistryId" IN (SELECT "AsnRegistryId" FROM "TenantAsnRegistries" WHERE "TenantId" = ${tenant:singlequote}::uuid AND "DeletedAt" IS NULL))
GROUP BY time, c."Name"
HAVING COUNT(*) > 5
ORDER BY time

SELECT 
  c."Name" as "Country",
  COUNT(*) as "Events"
FROM "ThreatEvents" te
JOIN "Countries" c ON te."SourceCountryId" = c."Id"
WHERE te."DeletedAt" IS NULL 
  AND $__timeFilter(te."Timestamp")
  AND ( ${tenant:singlequote} = 'All' OR te."AsnRegistryId" IN (SELECT "AsnRegistryId" FROM "TenantAsnRegistries" WHERE "TenantId" = ${tenant:singlequote}::uuid AND "DeletedAt" IS NULL))
GROUP BY c."Name"
ORDER BY "Events" DESC
LIMIT 20

SELECT 
  c."Name" as "Country",
  ar."Number" as "ASN",
  ar."Description" as "ASN Description",
  COUNT(*) as "Events",
  COUNT(DISTINCT "SourceAddress") as "Unique IPs",
  COUNT(DISTINCT "Category") as "Categories"
FROM "ThreatEvents" te
JOIN "Countries" c ON te."SourceCountryId" = c."Id"
JOIN "AsnRegistries" ar ON te."AsnRegistryId" = ar."Id"
WHERE te."DeletedAt" IS NULL 
  AND $__timeFilter(te."Timestamp")
  AND ( ${tenant:singlequote} = 'All' OR te."AsnRegistryId" IN (SELECT "AsnRegistryId" FROM "TenantAsnRegistries" WHERE "TenantId" = ${tenant:singlequote}::uuid AND "DeletedAt" IS NULL))
GROUP BY c."Name", ar."Number", ar."Description"
ORDER BY "Events" DESC
LIMIT 25

SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN EXTRACT(HOUR FROM "Timestamp") BETWEEN 0 AND 5 THEN 'Night Hours (00-05 UTC)'
    WHEN EXTRACT(HOUR FROM "Timestamp") BETWEEN 6 AND 11 THEN 'Morning Hours (06-11 UTC)'
    WHEN EXTRACT(HOUR FROM "Timestamp") BETWEEN 12 AND 17 THEN 'Afternoon Hours (12-17 UTC)'
    WHEN EXTRACT(HOUR FROM "Timestamp") BETWEEN 18 AND 23 THEN 'Evening Hours (18-23 UTC)'
  END as "Time Period (UTC)",
  c."Name" as "Country",
  COUNT(*) as "Events"
FROM "ThreatEvents" te
JOIN "Countries" c ON te."SourceCountryId" = c."Id"
WHERE te."DeletedAt" IS NULL 
  AND $__timeFilter(te."Timestamp")
  AND ( ${tenant:singlequote} = 'All' OR te."AsnRegistryId" IN (SELECT "AsnRegistryId" FROM "TenantAsnRegistries" WHERE "TenantId" = ${tenant:singlequote}::uuid AND "DeletedAt" IS NULL))
GROUP BY 
  CASE 
    WHEN EXTRACT(HOUR FROM "Timestamp") BETWEEN 0 AND 5 THEN 'Night Hours (00-05 UTC)'
    WHEN EXTRACT(HOUR FROM "Timestamp") BETWEEN 6 AND 11 THEN 'Morning Hours (06-11 UTC)'
    WHEN EXTRACT(HOUR FROM "Timestamp") BETWEEN 12 AND 17 THEN 'Afternoon Hours (12-17 UTC)'
    WHEN EXTRACT(HOUR FROM "Timestamp") BETWEEN 18 AND 23 THEN 'Evening Hours (18-23 UTC)'
  END, c."Name"
HAVING COUNT(*) > 10
ORDER BY "Events" DESC
LIMIT 40

WITH country_category AS (
  SELECT 
    c."Name" as "Source Country",
    dc."Name" as "Destination Country",
    "Category",
    COUNT(*) as "Events"
  FROM "ThreatEvents" te
  JOIN "Countries" c ON te."SourceCountryId" = c."Id"
  LEFT JOIN "Countries" dc ON te."DestinationCountryId" = dc."Id"
  WHERE te."DeletedAt" IS NULL 
    AND $__timeFilter(te."Timestamp")
    AND te."DestinationCountryId" IS NOT NULL
    AND ( ${tenant:singlequote} = 'All' OR te."AsnRegistryId" IN (SELECT "AsnRegistryId" FROM "TenantAsnRegistries" WHERE "TenantId" = ${tenant:singlequote}::uuid AND "DeletedAt" IS NULL))
  GROUP BY c."Name", dc."Name", "Category"
  HAVING COUNT(*) > 10
)
SELECT 
  "Source Country",
  "Destination Country", 
  "Category",
  "Events"
FROM country_category
ORDER BY "Events" DESC
LIMIT 30

SELECT 
  $__timeGroup(te."Timestamp", $__interval) as time,
  "Category",
  c."Name" as "Country",
  COUNT(*) as "Events"
FROM "ThreatEvents" te
JOIN "Countries" c ON te."SourceCountryId" = c."Id"
WHERE te."DeletedAt" IS NULL 
  AND $__timeFilter(te."Timestamp")
  AND ( ${tenant:singlequote} = 'All' OR te."AsnRegistryId" IN (SELECT "AsnRegistryId" FROM "TenantAsnRegistries" WHERE "TenantId" = ${tenant:singlequote}::uuid AND "DeletedAt" IS NULL))
  AND c."Name" IN (
    SELECT c2."Name" 
    FROM "ThreatEvents" te2
    JOIN "Countries" c2 ON te2."SourceCountryId" = c2."Id"
    WHERE te2."DeletedAt" IS NULL 
      AND $__timeFilter(te2."Timestamp")
      AND ( ${tenant:singlequote} = 'All' OR te2."AsnRegistryId" IN (SELECT "AsnRegistryId" FROM "TenantAsnRegistries" WHERE "TenantId" = ${tenant:singlequote}::uuid AND "DeletedAt" IS NULL))
    GROUP BY c2."Name"
    ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
    LIMIT 5
  )
GROUP BY time, "Category", c."Name"
ORDER BY time

list.name: tenant
list.label: Tenant
list.query: SELECT "Id"::text AS __value, "Name" AS __text FROM "Tenants" WHERE "DeletedAt" IS NULL ORDER BY "Name";
